payment.subtitle: You are just one step away from discovering your matching career!
payment.description: With Vinster you will discover what your best matching next career step is. The method behind Vinster is based on years of experience with career research and has already helped thousands of people.
payment.get_started: Start today with the enthusiasm scan and discover what really drives you in your work. The complete program takes about 45 minutes and gives you immediate insight into your personal career profile.

features.full_scan_desc: Discover when you are in your element
features.dream_jobs_desc: Explore different possibilities that suit you
features.personal_report_desc: With three functions that suit you
features.search_profile_desc: Your ideal function summarized in one powerful sentence

pricing.title: Full access
pricing.subtitle: One-time payment for your personal career report
pricing.payment_methods: Pay securely with iDEAL, credit card or PayPal

data_safety.title: 100% Safe & GDPR-compliant
data_safety.description: Your data is completely safe and GDPR-compliant. We use AI models to generate your personal insights, but your data is never stored by these models. Everything remains private and confidential with you.

access_code.label: Do you have an access code?
access_code.invalid_desc: This code is not valid or does not provide full discount
access_code.success_desc: You are being redirected to Vinster...
access_code.error_desc: An error occurred. Please try again.

dashboard.description: This is your personal dashboard. Here you can see the progress of your career research and continue where you left off.
dashboard.intro_paragraph1: Here starts your career process! We begin with the enthusiasm scan, the first step to discover what you like to do and how you like to work. In this scan we look for moments when you are in your element.
dashboard.intro_paragraph2: By asking questions about your childhood, school time and work experiences, we map your personal pattern of preferences and interests.
dashboard.intro_paragraph3: Your enthusiasm is an important indicator of what you really enjoy. When you do something that makes you enthusiastic, energy and satisfaction arise. That's what we're looking for.

important_info.title: Important to know
important_info.point1: • There are no right or wrong answers - be honest about what you really enjoy
important_info.point2: • Think of concrete situations and experiences from your life
important_info.point3: • You can take as much time as you want - there is no time pressure on this process
important_info.point4: • It's actually good to let the answers settle for a day before continuing
important_info.point5: • You can always adjust your answers during the process

step_blocked.title: Step Locked
